title: Add default sales stage templates and guided stage mapping during setup

sections.text: Implement a setup step that proposes a default stage model (e.g., Prospecting → Qualification → Proposal → Negotiation → Closed Won/Lost) based on detected CRM pipeline configuration, and guides users to map/merge their CRM stages into the canonical Sales_Accelerator stages. Include validation to ensure every active CRM stage is mapped and that key milestones (e.g., commit/closed) are covered. This reduces manual effort required to define what “good” looks like for stage-based forecasting, next-best-action, and risk alerts.
